html.title: Html
html.content: HTML defines web page structure and content with tags.

css.title: Css
css.content: CSS styles and layouts web pages, controlling colors and fonts.

expressjs.title: Express Js
expressjs.content: Express.js is a framework for building fast and scalable web apps.

nextjs.title: Next Js
nextjs.content: Next.js enables server-side rendering for React apps, enhancing SEO.

tailwindcss.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwindcss.content: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first framework for designing responsive UIs.

dart.title: Dart
dart.content: Dart is used with Flutter for fast, high-performance app development.

flutter.title: Flutter
flutter.content: Flutter builds natively compiled apps for mobile, web, and desktop.

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.content: JavaScript adds interactivity and dynamic behavior to web pages.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.content: TypeScript enhances JavaScript with static typing for better code quality.

react.title: React
react.content: React builds interactive UIs with reusable components and fast rendering.

node.title: Node
node.content: Node.js runs JavaScript on the server, enabling scalable network apps.

mongodb.title: MongoDB
mongodb.content: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data as flexible JSON documents.

sass.title: Sass
sass.content: Sass extends CSS with variables and nesting for easier styling.
